# Welcome!

Alvaro J. Pereira Filho is a researcher specializing in Canadian and comparative politics at Western University, Canada. 
His research primarily centers on partisanship and electoral behavior, and he actively collaborates with scholars from various disciplines, including political psychology and sociology. 
His work has been featured in *Opinião Pública* and *Innovation in Aging*.
